name: Noah
blurb: Noah ‘walked with God’ in a corrupt generation. Obedient to God’s word, he builds the ark and becomes the instrument of preservation through the Flood. Afterward, God covenants never again to destroy the earth with water, giving the rainbow as a sign. Jewish tradition debates whether Noah’s righteousness was relative or absolute; Christian readers see in him a type of Christ—obedient, saving his household.
